sources.title: Hour Of The Gun (1967) James Garner Â· Jason Robards
sources.description: Using arrest warrants like hunting licenses, a marshal mercilessly guns down five outlaws... A thrilling, psychological Western about the infamous 1881 clash between the Clanton Gang and Wyatt Earp , in which the lawman, perhaps more in keeping with historical truth, appears as a shady, revenge-driven character; John Sturges ' demythologized version of his own 1957 film " Gunfight at the O.K. Corral ."

metadata.Plot: Marshal Wyatt Earp kills a couple of men of the Clanton gang in a fight. In revenge, Clanton's thugs kill the Marshal's brother. Thus, Wyatt starts to chase the killers together with his friend Doc Holliday.
metadata.Actors: James Garner, Jason Robards, Robert Ryan
